title: Sarah Snook from 'Succession' counts Mrs Rupert Murdoch as a fan
text:
Piece of tech you can't live without? Well, my phone, obviously. But I'd rather live without it. I do like my noise-cancelling headphones though. Those are a godsend on planes.

What app do you open the most and why? Instagram or the news. Both are mindless scrolling, though, ugh. I do love WhatsApp. Lots of my friends are across loads of different timezones and I find it's the easiest way to keep up with them.

Shiv, Snook's character in "Succession", is a master manipulator.

It’s your birthday. How are you celebrating and with whom? It's December 1 and I've either "forgotten" to organise anything or I'm drinking tequila with my close friend Ande, who shares the same birthday as me.

It’s 5pm. What are you drinking? Tequila. Kidding! Margaritas.

OK, it’s 8pm, what are you drinking now? Now it's straight tequila.

Everyone has a guilty pleasure, what’s yours? Tequila. No, I'm kidding. It's Van Leeuwen's salted caramel ice cream. Have mercy.

Last binge-watch? Euphoria. Whoa.

Last book you read? Conversations With Friends by Sally Rooney (along with everyone else).

What book did you tell everyone you read but secretly may have skimmed? Can't skim. Physically impossible. I'm a full-cream book reader.

Advertisement

Everyone’s doing karaoke, including you. What’s your song? Doo Wop (That Thing) by Lauryn Hill. Everyone knows the chorus, and I taught myself the rap.

If you could choose it, your last meal on this earth would be … Right now? The whitefish and pickle sandwich from Bakeri in Greenpoint. Can't. Stop. Eating. Them.

If you had an entirely free day, with no prior commitments, what would you do? Walk around with my Olympus OM-2 taking photographs.

Snook's character Shiv, along with her brother Kendall (Jeremy Strong), is a strong contender to take over their father's media empire in "Succession". Fox Showcase

If you could, which chore would you give up forever? Cooking dinner. Ugh. So boring.

What’s the nicest present you’ve ever received? A boyfriend once made me a mini rocking chair out of matchsticks.

Favourite city? Melbourne, hands down. Then New York City and London, tied for second.

Luxury is … No one knowing you have a day off but you.

Season two of Succession is airing on Fox Showcase now.

The heritage issue of LUXURY is out on Friday, September 6 inside The Australian Financial Review. Follow LUXURY on Instagram.
description: The Australian actor has earned rave reviews playing the icy daughter of a media baron in the HBO series, which has recently been renewed for a third season.
